County Clare is lighting up today with solid surf: 12 ft @15s W and light 4 mph SE winds. Best spots include Crab Island and Doolin Point, both offering great windows throughout the day. Tomorrow, the swell drops to 3 ft @12s WNW with moderate 8 mph N winds, still workable at Lahinch and nearby spots. The day after sees a further drop to 2 ft @11s WNW, with light 10 mph NNE winds, keeping it fun at Lahinch Beach and Cregg Beach. Best: today.
